description: A wooden shortbow with a thin vine for a string, all formed from a single piece of wood, with twists and curves like it grew in place rather than being made.
A truly enormous wooden bow with a thin vine for a string, all formed from a single piece of wood, with twists and curves like it grew in place rather than being made.
An arrow all formed from a single piece of wood, with twists and curves like it grew in place rather than being made.  It even has leaves for fletching.
